comments:
"Mark as duplicated" action in Bugzilla task editor don't work on eclipse.org, but I can still submit comments to the same issue and it also works from the web UI

On submission editor show a error "Unable to submit at this time. Check connectivity and retry" and there is an exception in the log:

Fixed. Now sending blank new comment when marking duplicate if no comment provided by user. This could be considered a bug in Bugzilla 3.0.
Also fixed error reporting so this should come up in browser from now on
